events.text:
[i]That thing said it got tasked to help me? But [pause=0.25]who would give that kind of order?[/i]
[i][speed=10]... [pause=0.2][speed=1]he wouldn't do that without telling me, [pause=0.2]right?[/i]

"I'm back, Boss, but I'm still working through what that thing told me down there."
"Why are you smiling?"

"Well, I was thinking about how loyal you've been and it got me thinking."
"You've always been like a son to me, you know that?"
"Well I thought, why just like a son?"
"Long story short, I had some of my goons fill out some paperwork and I've officially adopted you!"
"Or rather, I've put myself down on your forged papers."
"I.... uh... don't know what to say."
"That's alright, son. I just wanted you to feel like a real part of this family."

[i]Son? I've never had a family like this until I joined our crime family. These people, the Boss especially, welcomed me in with open arms.[/i]
[i]I know it's just a name on some forged papers to keep the cops from getting suspicious of our operations, but still. It was a nice gesture.[/i]
[i]So why did I still feel uncomfortable asking the Boss if he asked a psychopathic machine to make me more efficient at killing?[/i]
"So, what was it you wanted to tell me? What did you learn about our friend down in the Vault?"

"I got it talking and... it said it got tasked with making me 'more efficient'."
"Do [i]you[/i] know anything about this? I mean, who could be giving this thing orders like that, and why me?"

[i]No backing down now. I need to know the truth/[/i]
"I'm asking if you know anything that you haven't told me."

"Hm."
"I'll look into it. Why don't you go back down there and see if you can't squeeze any more info out of that thing?"
